price: Isaan miidhaa dalagan yeroo azaaba argan, isaan irraa hin salphifamu; Yeroonis isaaniif hin kennamu.
arabic: وَإِذَا رَءَا ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ فَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā raā alladhīna ẓalamū al-ʿadhāba falā yukhaffafu ʿanhum walā hum yunẓarūna
